titleStmt.title: The examination of Joshua Hill, taken at Northampton, in the presence of the Earle of Essex, generall of the army, the 14th of September.
titleStmt.author: Hill, Joshua, 17th cent.
Essex, Robert Devereux, Earl of, 1591-1646.
Harper, Augustin.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Edward Husbands, and John Franke,

notesStmt.note: Order of the House to reprint the examination of Joshua Hill, describing the exactions of the cavaliers at Nottingham, and the deposition of Augustine Harper of Market Harborough on September 9, plundered by cavaliers. -- Steele.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
